blessings.description: A random player on your team becomes BIG. Increased Power, Max Vibe. Decreased Baserunning.
blessings.title: Eat me, Drink me

blessings.description: Zero to hero. The worst player on your team will earn 5x payouts for Idol Pendants.
blessings.title: Credit to the Team

blessings.description: They'll never see it coming. Maximize a random Pitcher in your Shadows.
blessings.subheader: Brought to you by @It Came From A Basement Podcast@http://itcamefromabasement.com/blaseball
blessings.title: Secret Weapon

blessings.description: Steal a Hitter from another Team's Shadows.
blessings.title: Grab and Smash

blessings.description: Send your 2 Worst Pitchers to the Shadows and call up your First 2 Relievers.
blessings.title: Out of Sight

blessings.description: Send your Worst 3 Hitters to the Shadows and call up the first 3 Shadows Hitters
blessings.title: Disappearing Acts

blessings.description: Give your Team Love Blood Type.
blessings.title: Feel the Love

blessings.description: Help yourselves. A player on each team in your Division gets Spicy.
blessings.title: Hot Sauce Bar

blessings.description: Give all of the teams not in your Division the Fifth Base.
blessings.title: Fifth Base Bubble

blessings.description: Give all of the teams not in your Division Targeted Shame.
blessings.title: The Shame Bubble

blessings.description: Improve your team's pitching by 10%. The last place team in the opposite subleague also gets +10% team pitching.
blessings.title: Tag Team Pitching

blessings.description: Improve your team's hitting by 10%. The last place team in the opposite subleague also gets +10% team hitting.
blessings.title: Tag Team Hitting

blessings.description: Incinerate the Most Idolized Player on your Team.
blessings.title: Kill Your Darling

blessings.description: Shed it. Incinerate the Worst Player on Your Team.
blessings.title: Dead Weight

blessings.description: A warm welcome. Incinerate the Least Idolized Player on Your Team.
blessings.title: New Kid

blessings.description: Feed the Hall Monitor. Fans of your team receive a big boatload of peanuts.
blessings.title: Boatload of Tiny Eggs

blessings.description: Recruit a rookie to be an extra player in your lineup.
blessings.title: New Recruit

blessings.description: Remove the worst player from your lineup. Your lineup is now shorter.
blessings.title: Downsizing

blessings.description: Item. Max Out Defense for a random player on your team.
blessings.title: Fishing Net

blessings.description: Keep your enemies closer. Improve your entire division by 2%.
blessings.title: Mutually Arising
